description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for handling CRUD operations and listing for recipes in a web application. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving by ID, creating, updating, and deleting recipes, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and validation.

classes.name: RecipeController
classes.description: REST controller managing recipe-related endpoints, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting recipes.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list recipes with optional search, filtering, pagination, and sorting.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a single recipe by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new recipe.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing recipe by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a recipe by ID.
